name: Against the Tide
description:
Your towers are weak, slow, and short-sighted. You must power them by matching gems and increasing their stats. But the gauge is constantly depleting so you must keep matching. While placing towers strategically against the endless hordes of enemies. You can customize your tower and skill selection. Use the level editor to create your own levels or play levels created by others online. 

Story
The island kingdom of Persalt is under attack from the Necromancer Queen. The princess has been sealed in the castle by the king's own magic. Her only companion is her handmaiden, the old crone, Gelder. Determined to aid her people, even from her gilded cage, she steals into her father's magical library to find a way...
